name: ChatGPTx
description: PopClip extension for revising, polishing, and translating texts, as well as performing arbitrary operations with the assistance of ChatGPT. The extension can either paste the result directly into the active application or copy and preview(with possible truncation) the result.

options.label: API Type
options.description: The type of API or services being used.

options.label: API Base
options.description: The base URL for chat completions API(/chat/completions).(Azure: https://{your-resource-name}.openai.azure.com/openai/deployments/{deployment-id})

options.label: API Version (Azure)
options.description: The API version to use, which follows the YYYY-MM-DD format. Azure only.

options.label: Model
options.description: The model to use with the chat completions API(/chat/completions), required by openai.

options.label: Revise
options.description: Enable this to help revising texts.

options.label: Polish
options.description: Enable this to help correcting the grammar and polishing texts.

options.label: Translate
options.description: Enable this to help translating texts into different languages(Chinese by default).

options.label: Custom Prompts
options.description:
Customize prompts for revising, polishing, or translating texts. Separate each action on a separate line, for example: [translate] Please translate the text into Chinese and only provide me with the translated content.
[revise] revise the text.
